import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-landing', templateUrl: './landing.component.html', styleUrls: ['./landing.component.scss'] }) export class LandingComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }

Welcome TO Johannesburg Hotel


A clean bed for a tired soul. Luxury is not a place, it's an experience. Located at the perfect place for a perfect vacation. Always deliver more than expected. The city's best-kept secret. A warm welcome awaits. Experience life face-to-face.
